meanings.definition: Sternness or severity of manner or attitude.
meanings.sent1: Her teacher's austerity made the students nervous.

meanings.sent3: The cat's austerity towards the new puppy was comical.
meanings.sent4: The austerity of the storm left the town in silence.
meanings.sent5: The austerity of the mountain peak was breathtaking.
